name: Knowledge delivery: Prometheus' misadventures
description:
You know, fire is too hot to hold it properly?

Knowledge delivery: Prometheus' misadventures is a golfootball game where you play as Prometheus, knowledge deliveryman.

You are tied to the fire of knowledge, which must be thrown into the bonfire, because otherwise you could die of cold!

Send the fire of knowledge to the bonfire to complete a level.

Kicking it (and standing around) increases your heat. Going to far from fire decreases it. Manage your temperature.

Beware of Pingolems, they can unite. 

Kick the fire into them to defeat.

Controls:

  • Press WASD/Arrows to move;
  • Press Spacebar to kick the fire;
  • Sorry, pause is in another game, use R to restart;
  • Press M to return to Main Menu.
